title: new champs in ranked
body: it would be cool if newly released champions were restricted from ranked play for around a week or so, so that abuse cases both positive and negative don't effect the rest of the team, e.g people trying the champ for the first time in ranked/ learning how to play against the champ/ stop people from the PTR having a leg up. not sure if everyone would be keen for this idea, would like feedback

replies.body: I understand your point, and do agree with this being a good thing to do, but I can somewhat understand why Riot might do this though. Once a new champion is released, there is a certain level of hype around obtaining this champion and the release skin with it (they bring out a bundle, etc). Putting this ranked restriction in place, will most likely convince some players not to obtain their new champion+skin using RP, as they may feel they can't use the champion to it's 'fullest' extent, as to not being able to use it in ranked. That being said, I really don't believe Riot is a company who's really 'In it for the money'. So, another reason, is that they want players to be able to use the champion that they purchase (IP or RP), in however way they feel, as they have recently purchased the champion.
